      • getDatabase

        public android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getDatabase(java.lang.String dbfile)
        Get a assets database, if this database is opened this method is only return a copy of the opened database
        参数:
        dbfile - , the assets file which will be opened for a database

      • closeDatabase

        public boolean closeDatabase(java.lang.String dbfile)
        Close assets database
        参数:
        dbfile - , the assets file which will be closed soon

        Close all assets database
